## Data

TFFRS Meet Result Data

1.  Athlete Name
2.  Athlete Class
3.  School
4.  Race Distance
5.  Time

## Questions

Who is going to be an All-American at the DIII 2025 XC National meet?

How does our model compare to the predictions created by LACCTiC?

## Stakeholders

Stakeholders could include a wide variety of people:

-   NCAA XC Coaches and Athletes

-   XC Fans and Spectators

-   High School Recruits interested in how different programs perform

-   Administrators and Athletics Departments from competing schools

## KPIs

-   Accuracy of model overall

-   Accuracy of model in comparison to LACCTiC

-   Models accuracy compared to predictions based off 8k season bests
